The Sabbath Day Is a Special Day
Kathryn, Charity, and Allie M., ages 9, 5, and 10, Idaho, USA
As sisters, we love to keep the Sabbath day holy together. We watch family videos instead of watching other movies. We read the

and play games together. We have family council as a family, where we gather at the table and go through the calendar for the week, have a solo, tell a scripture story, and do other fun things. We know we are blessed when we keep the Sabbath day holy.
